title: Add rotating game modes to Custom Games
body: I feel like when rotating game modes are released they should be playable in custom games, because often we are stuck with more than 5 people but still want to play the rotating game mode, however we can't because it is unplayable in custom games. Also just as an added suggestion make them permanent for custom games so that like people can play urf or all for one whenever they want to with their friends.

replies.body: Yeah I think that this would be good because you don't get any sort of rewards off playing customs so it wouldn't effect anything like that on top of it being a lot more fun then just playing a normal game.

Even though i don't play league often,
this idea sounds very good to implement imo.
@Riot can we please ban this man from discussions
OMG YESSSSS i might actually want to play customs

Dear Sirs and Madams,
I would very much like to see the added in the game in which i call league of legends. It would be quite enjoyable.
From a well informed chap.
